channel.title: [Delta] Ritzscape By Milkman [Delta]
channel.description:
Hi moparscape, I hate the server, "Ritzscape" so I have decided to create an exact copy of it and challenge Rangewhopdu's (Co-owner of Ritzscape) thought of him being the greatest coder alive and having the "custom train areas coded to top knotch standards". Dumbass.
I kind of gave up after the bass started jumping. This is about 10 hours worth of work that I added.
I just downloaded a delta, cleaned the crap out, and created it. Not too hard. I hope someone can host this and not make piece of shit mods and admins.
Also, I didn't make an exact copy, I added Grand Exchange, Shame Room (::banish), and renamed some objects. Couldn't get clipping to work but cba to actually try to make it work.
Note: There are some glitches but really don't feel like fixing them. Here are some pics:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/hugf39.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2edt5vm.png[/img]
135 Stats [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/whdzc7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/142v2md.png[/img]
Post Away!
[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?oec6cq3j1codibc]http://www.mediafire.com/?oec6cq3j1codibc[/URL] Its a package

item.title: [Delta] Ritzscape By Milkman [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“king_rauddys, post:32, topic:395045”][quote author=suber man link=topic=492236.msg3922370#msg3922370 date=1329855209]

Here Are Some Facts:

You couldn’t call it facts, these four sentences are opinions.

2: You Will Never Be possible To Copy Ritzscape. ( if you could evryone else would be possible to and evryone could have a great server without java knowledge )

This sentence didn’t made any sense.

3: You Don’t hate ritzscape, you are jaleous because you Are Not Sucessfull as Ritzscape.

Isn’t jealousy almost the same as hating? and I couldn’t call the server succesfully as I’ve never seen them on any toplist or advertisement thread or even advertising on a big server.

OT: nice release, will try out.
[/quote]

First of all, this is a forum & not a spelling competition.

and yes we advertised allot on the internet, at least i did.

-Rauddys[/quote]

Bro, fuck off. Nobody gives two squirts what you think.

If your going to end all of your posts with “-Rauddys”, like an egotistical tool, just put it in your signature.

exosiN:

Looks nice

Thanks but I don’t recommend using this… at all.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Ritzscape By Milkman [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @king_rauddys2 king_rauddys
item.description:
@king_rauddys2 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:1, topic:395045”]Hi moparscape, I hate the server, “Ritzscape” so I have decided to create an exact copy of it and challenge Rangewhopdu’s (Co-owner of Ritzscape) thought of him being the greatest coder alive and having the “custom train areas coded to top knotch standards”. Dumbass.

I kind of gave up after the bass started jumping. This is about 10 hours worth of work that I added.

I just downloaded a delta, cleaned the crap out, and created it. Not too hard. I hope someone can host this and not make piece of shit mods and admins.

Also, I didn’t make an exact copy, I added Grand Exchange, Shame Room (::banish), and renamed some objects. Couldn’t get clipping to work but cba to actually try to make it work.

Note: There are some glitches but really don’t feel like fixing them.
Here are some pics:

2edt5vm.png765×503

135 Stats

whdzc7.png765×503

142v2md.png765×503

Post Away!

http://www.mediafire.com/?oec6cq3j1codibc
Its a package[/quote]

wow, Dude

Here Are Some Facts:

1: This is A Total Shitty Version Of Ritzscape.
2: You Will Never Be possible To Copy Ritzscape. ( if you could evryone else would be possible to and evryone could have a great server without java knowledge )
3: You Don’t hate ritzscape, you are jaleous because you Are Not Sucessfull as Ritzscape.
4: Rangewhopdu is a dick.

( banned me 4 times on ritzscape, he was only being co-owner… couldn’t do anything because he hosted & payed vps ).

-Rauddys.

item.title: [Delta] Ritzscape By Milkman [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I’ve seen some people post that they wanted Ritzscape’s source so I took a little time to get the ball rolling. It isn’t my best work but instead of letting it sit on my desktop I thought I could just put it up and see what happens.

I might continue work with this and make it better… it all depends.

Read full topic
